鳱字的基本解释

鳱
gān
〔鳱鹊〕喜鹊。

鳱
hàn
〔鳱鴠ｄ啵睢澈拍瘛

鳱
yàn
古同“雁”。

鳱字的汉语字典释义

[①]［gān］
［《廣韻》古寒切，平寒，見。］
见“鳱鵲”。
[②]［hàn］
［《集韻》侯旰切，去翰，匣。］
亦作“鳿2”。
见“鳱2鴠”。
[③]［yàn］
同“鴈1”。

鳱字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鳱； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1482第03
【廣韻】古寒切【集韻】居寒切，?音干。【廣韻】鳱鵲，鳥名。知未來事。或作鳱鵠。【廣雅】鳱鵠，鵲也。鳱，一作乾。陸賈云：乾鵲噪而行人至。【玉篇】一作准。又【集韻】魚㵎切，音贗。【鹽鐵論】引《詩》：嗈嗈鳴鳱。○按今《詩》作鴈。又《禽經》：鳱以水言，自北而南。?以山言，自南而北。張華註：鳱?，?音鴈。鳱，隨陽鳥也。冬適南方集於江干，故字从干。?中春寒盡，鴈始北向，燕代尙寒，猶集山陸岸谷閒，故字从厈。《開元五經文字》：鴈又音岸。則鳱卽鴈字無疑矣。又【集韻】魚旰切，音岸。義同。又侯旰切，音翰。鳱鴠也。【淮南子·時則訓】仲冬鳱鴠不鳴。【高誘註】鳱鴠，夜鳴求旦之鳥。【禮·坊記】引逸詩：相彼鳱鴠，上猶患之。【月令】作鶡鴠。【廣雅】鶡鴠，䳚旦也。又名渴旦。【正字通】䳚，或省作鳱。鳱又有渴音也。

鳱字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
鳱字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［gān］
["Guangyun" Gu Han cut, Ping Han, see. ]
See "Bird magpie".
[②]［hàn］
["Ji Yun" Hou Jiqie, go to Han, Xia. ]
Also known as "鳿2".
See "鴠2鴠".
[③]［yàn］
Same as "Goose 1".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鳱; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 1482 Page 03
[Guangyun] Ancient Hanqie [Jiyun] Living in the cold and dry. [Guangyun] The name of the bird. Know the future. Or as a loach. [Guang Ya] 鳱鹄, magpie too.鳱, do it in one go. Lu Jiayun: Dry magpies are noisy and pedestrians arrive. [Jade articles] All are accurate. Also 【Jiyun】Fish 㵎 cut, sound pseudo. [Salt and Iron Theory] Quoting from "Poetry": 嗈嗈鳳鳱. ○According to today's "Poem" as a wild goose. Also in "Qin Jing": The word is from the north to the south. ? In Shan Yan, from south to north. Zhang Hua's Note: 鳱?,? Yin Yan. The bird is also with the sun. The south of Dongshi is concentrated in the Jianggan, so the word is from the dry. ?The cold end of the spring, the geese start northward, the Yan Dynasty is cold, and the mountains, land, banks and valleys are still set free, so the word is from 厈. "Kaiyuan Five Classics": Yanyou Yinan. The word 鳱卽Goose is undoubtedly true. Also 【Jiyun】Fish cut, sound bank. The same meaning. Hou Jiqie again, Yinhan.鳱鴠 also. [Huainanzi·Shi Zexun] In midwinter, the horns do not sing. [High lure note] Toch 鴠, the bird that sings and asks for life at night. [Rite·Fang Ji] Quoting Yi Poem: If you look at each other, you are still suffering from it. [Month Order] as Hewei. [Guang Ya] Yi Bing, Yi Dan also. Also known as Kedan. 【Zhengzitong】Hao, or province as 鳱. There is a thirst sound again.
